events.message: I am filing a claim following a collision that occurred between my car and another vehicle last night at an intersection.
The claim regarding the vehicle accident has been reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident for further processing.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle your car accident claim and will be your point of contact moving forward.
We have officially acknowledged receipt of your auto accident claim and have started the preliminary review process.
Please provide photographs of the damaged vehicle, police report, and any witness statements related to the accident.
All requested documents including detailed pictures of the collision damage and the official police report have been submitted.
The investigation into the circumstances of your vehicle collision claim has been officially initiated by the claims team.
The investigation has been completed confirming the fault and extent of damage reported in your car accident claim.
A settlement amount has been proposed based on the assessment of vehicle damage and repair costs after the accident.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed gratitude for the timely handling of their claim.
Your auto accident claim has been approved for the proposed settlement amount after final review by our claims department.
The payment for your approved car accident claim has been processed and issued to your designated bank account today.
The auto accident claim has been successfully closed following the completion of payment and resolution of all associated issues.
